page.title: 20ATTITUDES
page.content: 1985 is a depressing time all over the country. Mostly people complain all the time because they want the villages to be nicer places to live. When people were asked what sort of things they wanted they said that they wanted a cycle path all the way to Bingham because the road is a very busy one. Some even said silly things like the telephone boxes should have keys to keep them from being damaged. Generally most people liked the village and did not want to make many changes hardly anyone said that they would rather live somewhere else. Aslockton is the starting point of the South Notts hunt, lots of people go on it but many people in the village think that it is a horrible sport. It is mostly the farmers that go on it and the people who do other jobs don't like it.
